short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The First ever bookmark app which not only stores links but also marks the section from which you want to start or continue.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Google Chrome is the most popular search engine on the sphere. Each and every day, Google constantly upgrading and introduce many facilities for their millions of users. WebMark is a genuine endeavor slick browsing for the millions of Chrome users. 

❖	While we are reading a physical book or encyclopedia, we have to stop our task for one or the other reason. At that time we use a ribbon type physical strip of Bookmark. After some time when we spare suitable time for resuming the particular earlier work, we continue from the physical bookmark.
❖	But, the similar facility is not simple during browsing the internet. When one working on website document or webpage and want to continue from where he/she left earlier but it becomes hard to find that specific paragraph where you were. That’s why, for the very comfortable browsing and trouble-free searching of earlier referred websites, the distinctive feature of WebMark direct link us like a beckon. 
❖	For satisfactory fulfilment of the curiosity, interest and purpose; one refers so many topics on different websites and different various pages. When users browse the internet, their browsing record reflects in browsing history of the search engine. With help of WebMark one get rid of undergoing through tiring circumlocutory methods of exploring browsing history.

What you will admire regarding WebMark:

❖	Webmark: a comfortable bookmarker, a powerful plug-in which capable of not just storing the website but also loading it directly to the specific paragraph along with specified section that you have marked and stored earlier.
❖	Don’t worry, WebMark is here with the top most solution which helps to catch the same paragraph you where while storing it as a WebMark and load it from WebMark app extension.
❖	Come and explore “WebMark”!
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
(Note: WebMark is proposed name of the suggested specific feature)
